default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to garnish

steps: Place the cream, mustard, lemon juice and salt and freshly ground black pepper into a saucepan and bring to the boil.
Add the salmon and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the hot cooked pasta to the sauce and stir well.
To serve, stir and spoon into two serving bowls. Garnish with chopped chives.
title: Creamy salmon pasta with a mustard, cream and chive sauce
